name: Rigid Flame
description: You’re the captain of a small ship lost in space. Your scientists tell you that “the derivative of entropy with respect to time is significantly diminished within this region” … whatever that means. Suddenly, alien spaceships appear all around you. You’ve been ambushed! Unfortunately your ship’s just a cargo ship, so it isn’t equip with any weapons. Still, maybe you can use the strange properties of this place to get out of this situation… or maybe you’ll die trying.
